mapper.insert: INSERT INTO flowtask_column_archive ( archive_id, member_no, original_column_id, team_id, team_name, project_id, project_name, column_title, column_position, tasks_snapshot, archive_note, archived_at ) VALUES ( nextval('flowtask_column_archive_seq'), #{memberNo}, #{originalColumnId}, #{teamId}, #{teamName}, #{projectId}, #{projectName}, #{columnTitle}, #{columnPosition}, #{tasksSnapshot}::jsonb, #{archiveNote}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.select: SELECT archive_id, member_no, original_column_id, team_id, team_name, project_id, project_name, column_title, column_position, tasks_snapshot::text as tasks_snapshot, archive_note, archived_at FROM flowtask_column_archive WHERE archive_id = #{archiveId}
